Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Dewlap \Dew"lap`\, n. [Dew + lap to lick.] 1. The pendulous skin under the neck of an ox, which laps or licks the dew in grazing. [1913 Webster]
2. The flesh upon the human throat, especially when with age. [Burlesque] [1913 Webster]
On her withered dewlap pour the ale. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
dewlap n : a hanging fold of loose skin on an elderly person's neck
